reviews.title: An early release?
reviews.comment: The idea is sweet and simple! Just like commented earlier.. perfect for MIUI launch. However.. Found it a little stuttering. I have about 100 apps installed. Love to see a little more customization but most importantly to loose the stuttering!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really great for MIUI launcher. So fast to use!
